00034 using namespace Hypertable;

00036 CellStore *CellStoreFactory::open(const String &name,
00037                                   const char *start_row, const char *end_row) {
00038   String start = (start_row) ? start_row : "";
00039   String end = (end_row) ? end_row : Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00040   int64_t file_length;
00041   int32_t fd;
00042   size_t nread, amount;
00043   uint64_t offset;
00044   uint16_t version;
00045 
00047   file_length = Global::dfs->length(name);
00048 
00050   fd = Global::dfs->open(name);
00051 
00052   amount = (file_length < 512) ? file_length : 512;
00053   offset = file_length - amount;
00054 
00055   boost::shared_array<uint8_t> trailer_buf( new uint8_t [amount] );
00056 
00057   nread = Global::dfs->pread(fd, trailer_buf.get(), amount, offset);
00058 
00059   if (nread != amount)
00060     HT_THROWF(Error::DFSBROKER_IO_ERROR,
00061               "Problem reading trailer for CellStore file '%s'"
00062               " - only read %d of %lu bytes", name.c_str(),
00063               (int)nread, (Lu)amount);
00064 
00065   const uint8_t *ptr = trailer_buf.get() + (amount-2);
00066   size_t remaining = 2;
00067 
00068   version = Serialization::decode_i16(&ptr, &remaining);
00069 
00070   if (version == 1) {
00071     CellStoreTrailerV1 trailer_v1;
00072     CellStoreV1 *cellstore_v1;
00073 
00074     if (amount < trailer_v1.size())
00075       HT_THROWF(Error::RANGESERVER_CORRUPT_CELLSTORE,
00076                 "Bad length of CellStoreV1 file '%s' - %llu",
00077                 name.c_str(), (Llu)file_length);
00078 
00079     trailer_v1.deserialize(trailer_buf.get() + (amount - trailer_v1.size()));
00080 
00081     cellstore_v1 = new CellStoreV1(Global::dfs);
00082     cellstore_v1->open(name, start, end, fd, file_length, &trailer_v1);
00083     return cellstore_v1;
00084   }
00085   else if (version == 0) {
00086     CellStoreTrailerV0 trailer_v0;
00087     CellStoreV0 *cellstore_v0;
00088 
00089     if (amount < trailer_v0.size())
00090       HT_THROWF(Error::RANGESERVER_CORRUPT_CELLSTORE,
00091                 "Bad length of CellStoreV0 file '%s' - %llu",
00092                 name.c_str(), (Llu)file_length);
00093 
00094     trailer_v0.deserialize(trailer_buf.get() + (amount - trailer_v0.size()));
00095 
00096     cellstore_v0 = new CellStoreV0(Global::dfs);
00097     cellstore_v0->open(name, start, end, fd, file_length, &trailer_v0);
00098     return cellstore_v0;
00099   }
00100   return 0;
00101 }
